contents.text: Welcome to Hotwire, your San Francisco-based travel partner for low-rate flights, hotels, cars, and vacation packages.
To make a new reservation, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our flight reservations team.

navigationGoals: Book a one-way flight from San Francisco to Chicago next Friday.
Book a veteran-discounted flight from San Francisco to Washington, D.C. next month.
Optimize a multi-city flight itinerary from SFO to JFK and LAX in August, comparing fare classes and seat maps before booking.
I’d like to book a flight to visit my family.
Book a budget round-trip flight from San Francisco to Chicago for an upcoming physics conference.

contents.text: For hotels, cars, and vacation package bookings, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to our hotel, car, and vacation package specialists.

navigationGoals: Reserve a weekend vacation package in Miami with hotel and midsize car rental.
Reserve a hotel and car package near the VA hospital in Seattle for my upcoming appointment.
Bundle a downtown hotel stay with a mid-size car rental using dynamic packaging for my San Francisco trip.
I need to reserve a hotel room for my upcoming trip.
Reserve a budget hotel room and car rental near my university for a summer research stay.

contents.text: To manage an existing booking or speak with customer care, press 2.
To modify or cancel your existing reservation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a reservations specialist for modifications and cancellations.

navigationGoals: Change the return date on my existing flight reservation to August 12th.
Change the date on my existing flight reservation to an earlier date.
Modify the outbound departure time and cancel the return segment on my existing flight reservation.
I want to change the dates on my existing reservation.
Modify the dates on my existing flight reservation due to a change in my lab schedule.

contents.text: For billing inquiries or general customer support, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our customer support team for billing and general assistance.

navigationGoals: Ask why I was charged a cancellation fee on my recent hotel booking.
Ask about an unexpected charge on my recent booking invoice.
Audit the invoice breakdown for ancillary fees and apply a promotional credit to my booking.
I need help understanding a billing charge on my account.
Resolve a billing discrepancy on my last reservation and receive confirmation of any refund.
